Item ID11237

Dragon arrowtips are arrowheads which are possible loot from dragon implings and are used to create dragon arrows at level 90 Fletching. Fletching a set of 15 dragon arrows yields 225 Fletching experience.

Products[edit | edit source]

ItemMembersSkillsXPMaterials
Dragon arrow × 15
  • 90
  • 225
  • 15 × Headless arrow
  • 15 × Dragon arrowtips

[[File:Dragon arrowtips detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Dragon arrowtips''' are [[Arrowtips|arrowheads]] which are possible loot from [[dragon impling]]s and are used to create [[dragon arrow]]s at level 90 [[Fletching]]. Fletching a set of 15 dragon arrows yields 225 Fletching [[experience]].
